# Summary: jsonc.ts

## File Type
.ts - TypeScript source file

## Purpose
Purpose not explicitly documented

## Key Components

### Functions (1)
- **stripJsoncComments**: Strips comments from JSONC content while respecting string boundaries.
Handles // and /* comments, URLs in strings, and escaped quotes.
Also removes trailing commas to support more relaxed JSONC format.




## Dependencies
No external dependencies
